thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 31 of 538
thread.title: Yalonda White

author: Yalonda White
title: Yalonda White
text:
I've been a member for less than a month, I think Customer Service is fantastic. I missed a few cancellations and they refunded my money to me. And now they have a new section for Plus Sizes! After all, we big girls want to look cute while we slim down as well. So I give them 4 stars. I would give 5 stars, but the website is a little slow and difficult to use. After adding something to the cart, you don't go back to the page you were on, you have to start your search over - a little frustrating.
Overall, still a member, so still very happy with the quality of the product. I play volleyball and I need sturdy workout equipment that is easy to care for. Everything is machine washable and does not shrink or stretch.
